alert.note: Alert for Hartley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 02 at 7:55PM CDT until October 02 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR WESTERN TEXAS...CIMARRON...WESTERN SHERMAN...DALLAM... NORTHWESTERN MOORE AND NORTHEASTERN HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 755 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Texline to 12 miles south of Conlen, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Stratford, Boise City, Texline, Keyes, Kenton, Wheeless, Black Mesa Park, Felt, Griggs, Eva, Ware, Conlen, and Sturgis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
